title: Ticket #7823: Complete set of condor_submit_dag options in from_dag() python binding
description:
Currently our htcondor.Submit.from_dag() python binding allows us to pass in a dictionary of dag arguments. These replicate the functionality of the various command-line options we can pass to condor_submit_dag.

However we currently only support a limited number of arguments:

  • MaxIdle
  • MaxJobs
  • MaxPre
  • MaxPost
  • AutoRescue
  • DoRescueFrom
  • Force

We want to expand this to support the full range of options that can be passed to condor_submit_dag (with a couple of exceptions that are not applicable to a python binding).
